magpie.data.utilities.filters

Class PredictionOutlierFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • magpie.data.utilities.filters.BaseDatasetFilter
      • magpie.data.utilities.filters.PredictionOutlierFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Options

    public class PredictionOutlierFilter
extends BaseDatasetFilter
    Filters entries based on whether they are outliers. Uses RobustRegressionUtility and methods described by Motulsky and Brown to detect outliers. Data must have a both a measured and predicted class variable.

    Usage: [-q <Q>] [-k <K> [-frac <fraction>]
    Q: Target false discovery rate
    K: Number of fitting parameters in model
    fraction: Fraction of entries to check for being an outlier (starts with those with largest errors)

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
